arts.ttl: Sevilla manager confirms offers for forward and left-back to be left out of squad ahead of exit
arts.sum: Sevilla manager Francisco Javier Garcia Pimienta has been blunt about the future of Kelechi Iheanacho and Valentin Barco, with both expected to leave in the January transfer window. Neither will be part of their Copa del Rey trip to face Almeria on Sunday. arts.ttl: Two Sevilla players look to be on their way out of the club in January
